# isOpen()

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the pop-up is open.

## Declaration

```swift
func isOpen() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the pop-up is open; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Accessing and Setting the Open State

- **setIsOpen(_:)**: Sets the open state of the pop-up menu.
